title: Solo Queue BS
body: so i havent played ranked in ages i go on to maybe climb a little, first game goes great my team isnt toxic or complaining at all. next game i get an afk at 3 minutes and a mid (who begged for it in champ select) who died early then flamed jungler for "not ganking" when jungler was lvl 2. next i was in champion select i am put last pick ask for mid as it is my main, then our first pick locks in alistair and says full ap alistair mid. then he reason wiht him to go a tanky top lane then the next pick, picks teemo mid which everyone knows is another troll pick. so i dodge and i am gien a 30 minute leave buster and Lp loss for nothing i did wrong but not want to play with trolls, this is an unfair system that in a way promotes trolling as they know that they wont lose anything as others want to win and wont play with trolls

replies.body:
Try to look at this from Riot's perspective.

Say there was no punishment for dodging games. The incentive would be to dodge games untill you have;

1. Your main champion and role.
2. The most OP champions on your team.
3. The weakest champions possible on the enemy team.

Basically no one would get into game ever. So they must have some decently serious punishment, to avoid players dodging for toxic reasons; "Oh he lost lane last game" or "WTF Jayce isn't even a good pick ATM".

Of course dodging to avoid trolls is necessary in some cases, but they are few and far between. Just keep playing games, and you should keep winning slowly! Remember not to take it too seriously.

Pretty much this. The system is fine as it is if you're only dodging every now and then when you have people actually trolling. I think adding the option to report people in champ select would be beneficial but they shouldn't remove the penalty for the guy who actually dodges.

how about you dont loose lp but have a 5 min timer that goes to 10 if you dodge again
then 20 then 30 ect
because when someone says mid or feed then feeds anyways is just a pain
